# tg_cert (Data Source)

Fetches cert info from Trustgrid - will error if it doesn't exist

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "tg_cert" "cert" {
  fqdn = "myapp.trustgrid.io"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `fqdn` (String) Certificate FQDN

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
